13419.name: Lineage II Commemorative Mark
13419.description: Keep this Lineage II Commemorative Mark safe and it will bring you luck. If destroyed, it loses its effect. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. May be stored in a private warehouse.

13420.name: Multi-colored Honey Rice Cake
13420.description: Fully replenishes your Vitality. The effect does not apply to pets. Reuse time is 60 minutes. Multi-Colored Honey Rice Cake

13421.name: Honey Wheat Cake
13421.description: Fully replenishes your Vitality. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse time is 60 minutes. Honey Wheat Cake

13468.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Cutter Conversion. Haste, Focus, or Health can be bestowed. When enchanted to 4 or more, there's a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk., and the amount of recieved heal, and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack.
